## PathUtils.isAbsolute() method

Determines whether the path is absolute.

Definition here: absolute paths start with "/".

**Signature:**

```typescript
static isAbsolute(path: string): boolean;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the path starts with "/", otherwise false.
